attributes.additional_details: It's  causing the housing crisis around the UK.  Forcing local councils to build thousands of flats  everywhere .. green belt woodland. countryside and farmland including local parks. Will vanish under housing developments    Wildlife animals will be pushed to extinction.
attributes.background: rishi sunak promised to stop the boats. But it looks like he has back tracked and will wave through illegal immigrants to settle in the UK the United Kingdom is already overpopulated as it is. By 67 million   The  migrants will increase the numbers even further .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627339
